remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 以下示例连接到远程计算机，并显示有关远程计算机上的操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. 使用所需的连接选项创建连接到远程计算机的。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions-9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions-9/cs/ConnectionOptions-9.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions-9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions-9/vb/ConnectionOptions-9.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::AuthenticationLevel Authentication { System::Management::AuthenticationLevel get(); void set(System::Management::AuthenticationLevel value); };
member this.Authentication : System.Management.AuthenticationLevel with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于此连接中的操作的 COM 身份验证级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection.

value.span: 返回 枚举值，该值指示连接到本地或远程计算机时使用的 COM 身份验证级别。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value indicating the COM authentication level used for a connection to the local or a remote computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 2000 及更低版本上，WMI 服务将请求连接级别的身份验证，而在 Windows XP 和更高版本中，它将请求数据包级身份验证。On Windows 2000 and below, the WMI service will request Connect level authentication, while on Windows XP and higher it will request Packet level authentication. 如果客户端需要特定身份验证设置，则可以使用此属性来控制此特定连接上的身份验证级别。If the client requires a specific authentication setting, this property can be used to control the authentication level on this particular connection. 例如， 如果客户端要求对所有通信进行加密，则可以将属性设置为。For example, the property can be set to if the client requires all communication to be encrypted. ## 属性值Property Value 要用于此连接中的操作的 COM 身份验证级别。The COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection. 默认值为 ，指示客户端将根据标准 DCOM 协商过程使用服务器请求的身份验证级别。The default value is , which indicates that the client will use the authentication level requested by the server, according to the standard DCOM negotiation process. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 以下示例连接到远程计算机，并显示有关远程计算机上的操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. 使用所需的连接选项创建连接到远程计算机的。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication/cs/ConnectionOptions_Authentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication/vb/ConnectionOptions_Authentication.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Authority { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Authority : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置将用于验证指定用户的授权。

span.span: Gets or sets the authority to be used to authenticate the specified user.

value.span: 返回 ，它定义了用于对指定用户进行身份验证的授权。

span.span: Returns a that defines the authority used to authenticate the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须按如下方式传递：如果以字符串 "Kerberos：" 开头，则将使用 Kerberos 身份验证，并且此属性应包含 Kerberos 主体名称。The property must be passed as follows: If it begins with the string "Kerberos:", Kerberos authentication will be used and this property should contain a Kerberos principal name. 例如，For example, ``` Kerberos: ``` 如果属性值以字符串 "NTLMDOMAIN：" 开头，则将使用 NTLM 身份验证，并且属性应包含 NTLM 域名。If the property value begins with the string "NTLMDOMAIN:", NTLM authentication will be used and the property should contain a NTLM domain name. 例如，For example, ``` NTLMDOMAIN: ``` 如果属性为 null，则将使用 NTLM 身份验证，并将使用当前用户的 NTLM 域。If the property is null, NTLM authentication will be used and the NTLM domain of the current user will be used. ## 属性值Property Value 否则 `null` ，此属性可以包含要在其中获取要进行身份验证的用户的 WINDOWS NT/windows 2000 域的名称。If not `null`, this property can contain the name of the Windows NT/Windows 2000 domain in which to obtain the user to authenticate. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 以下示例连接到远程计算机，并显示有关远程计算机上的操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. 使用所需的连接选项创建连接到远程计算机的。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority/cs/ConnectionOptions_Authority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority/vb/ConnectionOptions_Authority.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否需要为连接操作启用用户特权。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.

summary.span: 只有在执行的操作需要启用某种用户特权（例如，重新启动计算机）时，才应使用此属性。

span.span: This property should only be used when the operation performed requires a certain user privilege to be enabled (for example, a machine restart).

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示是否需要为连接操作启用用户特权。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果需要为连接操作启用用户特权，则为;否则为 `false` 。`true` if user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation; otherwise, `false`. 默认值是 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::ImpersonationLevel Impersonation { System::Management::ImpersonationLevel get(); void set(System::Management::ImpersonationLevel value); };
member this.Impersonation : System.Management.ImpersonationLevel with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于此连接中的操作的 COM 模拟级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection.

value.span: 返回 枚举值，该值指示用于连接到 WMI 的模拟级别。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value indicating the impersonation level used to connect to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当提供程序是受信任的应用程序或服务时，此设置很有用。The setting is advantageous when the provider is a trusted application or service. 它使提供程序无需为请求的操作执行客户端标识和访问检查。It eliminates the need for the provider to perform client identity and access checks for the requested operations. 但是，如果出于某种原因无法信任该访问接口，则允许它模拟客户端可能构成安全威胁。However, if for some reason the provider cannot be trusted, allowing it to impersonate the client may constitute a security threat. 在这种情况下，我们建议将此属性设置为较低的值，例如 。In such cases, we recommend that this property be set by the client to a lower value, such as . 请注意，这可能会导致提供程序执行请求的操作失败，缺少权限不足或无法执行访问检查。Note that this may cause failure of the provider to perform the requested operations, for lack of sufficient permissions or inability to perform access checks. ## 属性值Property Value 要用于此连接中的操作的 COM 模拟级别。The COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection. 默认值为 ，指示 WMI 提供程序在此连接中执行请求的操作时可模拟客户端。The default value is , which indicates that the WMI provider can impersonate the client when performing the requested operations in this connection. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 以下示例连接到远程计算机，并显示有关远程计算机上的操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. 使用所需的连接选项创建连接到远程计算机的。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation/cs/ConnectionOptions_Impersonation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation/vb/ConnectionOptions_Impersonation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Locale { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Locale : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置将用于连接操作的区域设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the locale to be used for the connection operation.

value.span: 返回 值，该值用于连接到 WMI 时使用的区域设置。

span.span: Returns a value used for the locale in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 Microsoft 区域设置标识符，字符串的格式为 "MS_*xxx*"，其中 *xxx* 是十六进制格式的字符串，用于指示区域设置标识 (LCID) ;例如，美国英语显示为 "MS_409"。For Microsoft locale identifiers, the format of the string is "MS_*xxx*", where *xxx* is a string in hexadecimal form that indicates the Locale Identification (LCID); for example, American English would appear as "MS_409". ## 属性值Property Value 默认值为 DEFAULTLOCALE。The default value is DEFAULTLOCALE. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 以下示例连接到远程计算机，并显示有关远程计算机上的操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. 使用所需的连接选项创建连接到远程计算机的。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale/cs/ConnectionOptions_Locale.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale/vb/ConnectionOptions_Locale.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Password { void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Sets the password for the specified user.

value.span: 返回 值，该值用于连接到 WMI 时使用的密码。

span.span: Returns a value used for the password in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空字符串 ( "" ) 指定有效的零长度密码。A blank string ("") specifies a valid zero-length password. 硬编码密码是一种安全威胁。Hard-coding a password is a security threat. 使用安全预防措施（如加密密码）或在设置属性时提示用户输入密码 。Use security precautions such as encrypting a password, or prompting the user for a password when you set the property. ## 属性值Property Value 默认值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果用户名为 `null` ，则使用的凭据将是当前已登录用户的凭据。If the user name is also `null`, the credentials used will be those of the currently logged-on user. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).

span.span: Returns a SecureString value used for the password in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: 空白 ( "" ) 指定有效的零长度密码。A blank ("") specifies a valid zero-length password.

member this.Username : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置将用于连接操作的用户名。

span.span: Gets or sets the user name to be used for the connection operation.

value.span: 返回 值，该值用作连接到 WMI 时使用的用户名。

span.span: Returns a value used as the user name in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户名来自当前域之外的域，则该字符串可能包含域名和用户名，用反斜杠分隔：字符串 "username" = "EnterDomainHere \\ \EnterUsernameHere"。If the user name is from a domain other than the current domain, the string may contain the domain name and user name, separated by a backslash: string 'username' = "EnterDomainHere\\\EnterUsernameHere". `strUser`参数不能为空字符串。The `strUser` parameter cannot be an empty string. ## 属性值Property Value `null` 如果连接将使用当前登录的用户，则为;否则，表示用户名的字符串。`null` if the connection will use the currently logged-on user; otherwise, a string representing the user name. 默认值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code). ## Examples 以下示例连接到远程计算机，并显示有关远程计算机上的操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. 使用所需的连接选项创建连接到远程计算机的。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName/cs/ConnectionOptions_Username.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName/vb/ConnectionOptions_Username.vb#1)]
